summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a character standing in front of a large, intricately carved stone structure resembling a hand. The character is equipped with a staff and appears to be wearing armor. The environment is a rocky terrain with steps leading up to the statue. A prompt in the center of the screen indicates an option to "Examine" the statue, suggesting an interactive element in the gameplay. The UI displays various icons in the bottom left corner, likely representing inventory or abilities, and a health bar. In the bottom right corner, additional icons are visible, possibly indicating other abilities or actions. Text on the right side of the screen reads "Portraits Updated" with a note about a "New Yaoguai King Anecdote Recorded," suggesting the player has unlocked or discovered new lore or information.
